Room.Name: Silk Dreams Bar
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the bar of the Silk Dreams Nightclub, probably getting drunk.
Room.LongDescription: The bar is a less active location than the main seating area to the east. Most people will just leave you alone to drink away your problems. The bouncers will also probably leave you alone in here, but an occassional criminal may come by to pick your pocket. The bar is well-stocked with all the finest human, elven and dwarven brews, including a very strong dwarven lager which will straighten any man's beard.
